languages.text: {n}Не выдержав боль, вы выдергиваете ладонь из плиты — на ней ни царапины. Мельтешащие символы мгновенно замирают и начинают угасать. Последним гаснет символ "Мор", исчезая с глади плиты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Не выдержав нарастающую боль, вы выдергиваете ладонь из плиты — на ней ни царапины. Мельтешащие символы мгновенно замирают и начинают медленно угасать. Последним гаснет символ "Мор", навсегда исчезая с глади плиты.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Не выдержав боль, вы выдергиваете ладонь из плиты — на ней ни царапины. Мельтешащие символы мгновенно замирают и начинают угасать. Последним гаснет символ "Мор", исчезая с глади плиты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can't stand the pain anymore, and jerk your hand out of the slab, on which not a scratch is left. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to go out and disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

{n}You can't stand the pain anymore, and jerk your hand out of the slab, on which not a scratch is left. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to go out and disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

{n}You can't stand the pain anymore, and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

{n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

{n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No aguantas más el dolor y apartas la mano de la losa. Está ilesa. Los símbolos intermitentes se detienen al momento y empiezan a desvanecerse. El último en desaparecer es el de Pestilencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No aguantas más el dolor y apartas la mano de la losa. Está ilesa. Los símbolos intermitentes se detienen al momento y empiezan a desvanecerse. El último en desaparecer es el de Pestilencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ne supportez plus la douleur et retirez votre main de la dalle, en constatant qu'elle est indemne. Les symboles vacillants s'immobilisent avant de disparaître lentement. Celui de pestilence est le dernier à s'effacer de la surface de la dalle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne supportez plus la douleur et retirez votre main de la dalle, en constatant qu'elle est indemne. Les symboles vacillants s'immobilisent avant de disparaître lentement. Celui de pestilence est le dernier à s'effacer de la surface de la dalle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}これ以上痛みに耐えきれず、平板から手を引き離す。傷を受けることなく。揺らめくシンボルは一瞬静止し、消え始めた。最後に平板の表面から消えたのは、「疫病」を表すシンボルだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これ以上痛みに耐えきれず、平板から手を引き離す。傷を受けることなく。揺らめくシンボルは一瞬静止し、消え始めた。最後に平板の表面から消えたのは、「疫病」を表すシンボルだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你再也无法忍受这样的疼痛，猛地将手抽了出来。你浑身上下毫发无损，原本闪烁的符号也凝滞在了金属板上，渐渐消逝。代表“瘟疫”的符号，是最后一个从金属板上消失的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你再也无法忍受这样的疼痛，猛地将手抽了出来。你浑身上下毫发无损，原本闪烁的符号也凝滞在了金属板上，渐渐消逝。代表“瘟疫”的符号，是最后一个从金属板上消失的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du kannst den Schmerz nicht mehr ertragen und ziehst deine Hand aus der Tafel — unverletzt. Die flackernden Symbole frieren augenblicklich ein und beginnen zu verblassen. Das Symbol für Pestilenz verschwindet als letztes von der Oberfläche der Tafel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kannst den Schmerz nicht mehr ertragen und ziehst deine Hand aus der Tafel — unverletzt. Die flackernden Symbole frieren augenblicklich ein und beginnen zu verblassen. Das Symbol für Pestilenz verschwindet als letztes von der Oberfläche der Tafel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Acıya daha fazla katlanamıyorsun ve elini tabakadan çekiyorsun. Elin zarar görmemiş durumda. Yanıp sönen semboller anında donuyor ve yavaşça kapanmaya başlıyor. Tabakanın yüzeyinden son yok olan sembol, Hastalık sembolü oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot stand the pain anymore and jerk your hand out of the slab — unscathed. The flickering symbols freeze at once and begin to fade. The symbol for Pestilence is the last to disappear from the slab's surface.{/n}
